column2: 1.1 The training helped me understand how digital tools support students’ personal and academic development.
column3: 1.2 I feel confident in using digital tools to facilitate student collaboration and communication.
column4: 1.3 The training provided practical strategies I can apply to enhance students’ critical thinking and creativity.
column5: 1.4 I feel well-equipped to integrate digital tools into my teaching to promote positive digital behaviours and interactions.
column6: 1.5 The training encouraged me to reflect on how digital tools can support students’ learning and problem-solving.
column7: 1.6 I feel confident guiding students to use digital tools effectively and responsibly in academic and social contexts.
column8: 1.7 The training helped me develop new approaches to engage students in creative and critical tasks using digital tools.
column9: 2.1 I feel confident applying the training materials in my classroom activities.
column10: 2.2 The materials provided practical, real-world examples that are easy to implement in teaching.
column11: 2.3 I can adapt the materials to meet the needs of my students and fit my teaching style.
column12: 2.4 The materials equipped me with tools that I can immediately use in my teaching practice.
